column2: House for Sale - Rajagiriya
column6: Located in one of the most renowned and 24 hour secure gated community housing schemes, “Royal Court” on Koswatta Road, Rajagiriya. Walking distance to Gateway International School, 24 hours Laugfs Supermarket, Keells, Cargills and many restaurants and shops. A highly residential and safe scheme with open space and nature friendly environment. Architecturally designed two story house with rooftop on 12.19 perches. Bordering a lake designed with a open view, good ventilation of fresh air and daylight throughout the house. 3 phase power with backup generator, main pipe water line with two large overhead tanks. 20 feet access roads to the house from two sides of the land with a private road section, two separate survey addresses, parking for 2 vehicles inside with roller door gate. Fully furnished and AC house, solar system generating 800 units per mouth, large living area with couch and theater style leather seating and HD projector, 8 seater dinning table, Modern style kitchen with island pantry cupboards, sink, cooker and island exhaust, LG double door fridge, 3 large rooms upstairs, two toilets upstairs, one toilet downstairs with a provision for a room. Wireless Alarm system, downstairs tiled floor, upstairs wood and tile floor. Rooftop with solar panels fixed on a metal tent structure. Servants / Storage room with toilet. Garden area of 500sqft with small section near garage. Price negotiable after inspection.
